# Scripts

Bundled resources for throughput-analyzer skill

- [x] analyze_throughput.py: Script to automate throughput analysis, collect metrics, and generate reports.
- [x] optimize_concurrency.py: Script to dynamically adjust concurrency limits based on real-time throughput data.
- [x] identify_bottlenecks.sh: Script to identify system bottlenecks using standard Linux tools (e.g., top, iostat).
